Wisdom: يَأْتِي عَلَى النَّاسِ زَمَانٌ لَا يُقَرَّبُ فِيهِ إِلَّا الْمَاحِلُ وَلَا يُسْتَظْرَفُ فِيهِ إِلَّا الْفَاجِرُ وَلَا يُضَعَّفُ فِيهِ إِلَّا الْمُنْصِفُ يَعُدُّونَ الصَّدَقَةَ غُرْماً وَصِلَةَ الرَّحِمِ مَنّاً وَالْعِبَادَةَ اسْتِطَالَةً عَلَى النَّاسِ وَيَظْهَرُ عَلَيْهِمُ الْهَوَى وَيَخْفَى بَيْنَهُمُ الْهُدَى
enWisdom: A time will come upon the people when none will be given a high position except the slanderer, none will be deemed witty except the corrupt and none will be regarded as weak but the justPeople will consider charity as a loss, keeping ties with near relatives as an obligation and worship as a means of gaining superiority over peopleVain desires will overcome them and guidance will disappear from among them
Kings have no affection
An evil commander commissions the vulgar one [to work for him]
The haughty oppressor is destroyed by his sins
NULL

Wisdom: اسْتِكَانَةُ الرَّجُلِ فِي الْعَزْلِ بِقَدْرِ شَرِّهِ [أَثَرِهِ‏] فِي الْوِلَايَةِ
enWisdom: The humiliation of the man being deposed is equivalent to his evil as a sovereign
When the vile become sovereigns, the dignified ones are ruined
When the wicked become rulers, the honourable are persecuted
When the depraved gain authority, hope turns into disappointment
The dominion of the vile is the humiliation of the honourable
The reign of the wicked is the [cause of] abasement of the virtuous
The coming to power of the wicked is the tribulation of the virtuous
Whoever rides the mount of injustice, his mount will stumble with him
An ignorant king exposes his [own] flaws

Wisdom: طَاعَةُ الْجَوْرِ تُوجِبُ الْهُلْكَ وَتَأْتِي عَلَى الْمُلْكِ
enWisdom: Submission to tyranny causes destruction and annihilates the kingdom
Submission to tyranny causes destruction and annihilates the kingdom

enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ جَارَ مُلْكَهُ تَمَنَّى النَّاسُ هُلْكَهُ
enWisdom: One who is tyrannical in his kingdom, the people wish for his annihilation

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَّ سَيْفَ الْعُدْوَانِ سُلِبَ عِزَّ السُّلْطَانِ
enWisdom: One who unsheathes the sword of aggression is stripped of the grandeur of kingship

Wisdom: لَا يَكُونُ الْعِمْرَانُ حَيْثُ يَجُورُ السُّلْطَانُ
enWisdom: There is no prosperity [in the place] where the king passes (or is oppressive)
